title: NA speaker congratulates newly elected Kashmir Journalist Forum office bearers
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 30 (APP):National Assembly Speaker Sardar Ayaz Sadiq on Monday extended his congratulations to the newly elected officials of the Kashmir Journalist Forum (JKF).
In his congratulatory message, the NA Speaker extended his felicitations to the newly elected President Sardar Irfan Sadozai, General Secretary Maqsood Muntazir, Treasurer Imran Azam, Information Secretary Ali Naqvi, and the other office bearers.
He reaffirmed the parliament’s commitment to freedom of expression and press freedom, emphasizing the crucial role of journalists in strengthening democracy and upholding the Constitution. He commended the Kashmir Journalist Forum for its efforts in highlighting the Kashmir issue and expressed hope that the newly elected leadership would continue supporting the welfare of Kashmiri journalists.
The National Assembly Speaker pledged to introduce effective legislation for journalists’ welfare and hoped the new Kashmir Journalist Forum leadership will actively support the well-being of Kashmiri journalists. He also conveyed his best wishes to the newly elected KJF body.
